glosses: A wild plant of the Poaceae family with poisonous seeds; Lolium temulentum, darnel, false wheat.
An olive tree that is not grafted.
A hawk or a sparrow hawk.
a town and district of Kırıkkale Province, Turkey

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish دلیجه (delice), from دلی (deli) or دلو (delu), equivalent to deli (“crazy, mad, insane”) + -ce.
